Summary: saw a red ball of light
divs: Sighting Detailsmy brother and i were outside of our home playing when we noticed a light movingin the sky. we wondered what it was so we watched it for a while it was movingeast. the as fast as a bullet it tuned up and headed north straght up thestopped. as we watched it it begain to pulse like a light bulb going out. i toldmy brother to go get a camera but when i said that this red light shot down atleast 1 mile and stopped over our heads. this thing was still way above us butwecould not move. then it was headed straght up and gone out of site in about 3sec.
